trans-unit.source: or_where() was formerly known as orwhere(), which has been removed.
order_by() was formerly known as orderby(), which has been removed.
primary_key - 1 if the column is a primary key
provided filters (CSRF, Honeypot, DebugToolbar) have been moved from app/Filters/ to system/Filters/
query builder testability simplified with new property, but dropped
trans-unit.target: 查询构建器的可测试性被新属性简化,但被删除了

unique/true : to generate a unique key for the field definition.

trans-unit.source: will match any character except for a forward slash (/) restricting the result to a single segment.
